name: NONOCROSS
description:
A game by Daniel Whiffing, with Music by https://www.purple-planet.com/

Use the left and right arrows to move.

Use the up and down arrows to aim and climb ladders.

Use Space to jump (You can jump twice)

Use Z to pick up blocks and X to put down blocks

Use C to toggle the visible hint axis.

Use R to restart level and M to toggle mute.

If you've never done nonograms before: http://gambiter.com/puzzle/Nonogram.html
